conbody.p: You will need the following items to successfully clean and maintain your Smith-Corona typewriter:

ul.li: A portable manual Smith Corona Sterling typewriter
Access to direct sunlight for drying purposes, or a fan
Plastic sheeting or paper towels for work-surface protection
Nitrile gloves to protect your hands from ink and cleaning agents
Compressed air with thin nozzle attachments. This can be an air can or machine air compressor
Soft-bristle brush (a car detailing brush or toothbrush can be used)
Multiple lint-free rags (three or more), such as microfiber towels
Spray bottle with nozzle head or droppr bottle
Mineral spirits, gentle degreaser, or rubbing alcohol
Cleaning solution (mild soap and water is ideal; all-purpose cleaners or detergents can also be used)
Optional: hydrogen peroxide for stubborn stains or discoloration
Light-weight oil (sewing machine oil, gun oil, or specialized typewriter oil)
